title: Question 24:
description: I don't have MetaMask, Trezor, Ledger, or Coinbase Wallet. How can I use the Synthetix dApps?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: Unfortunately you do need to use one of these to use our dApps. The easiest way to get started is with Metamask, which is a browser extension. You can import your private key from another wallet to be able to use it through Metamask (instructions [here](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3124084.msg32306055#msg32306055)).

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
